ADDI R18 0(R0)
ADDI R19 24(R0)
ADDI R20 30(R0)
loop: ANDI R21 R18 2
BZ R21 label1
ADDI R20, R20, 4
J label2
label1: SUBI R20, R20, 4
label2: ADDI R18, R18, 3
BEQ R18 R18 label3
J loop
HALT

00111110011100100000000000000010
01000000010000000000000000000000
01000100000000000000000000000000
